title: Rory Amon’s accuser sobs as he tells court of alleged abuse as 13-year-old at hands of former NSW MP
summary_full: Ex-state MP has pleaded not guilty to sexually abusing 13-year-old in 2017 with defence barrister claiming Amon did not know boy’s ageFollow our Australia news live blog for latest updatesGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastA former NSW MP’s alleged abuse victim has pushed through tears while testifying in court.Rory Amon, 36, has pleaded not guilty to various criminal sexual acts against a teenage boy in 2017 and faced a NSW Supreme Court jury trial on Friday. Continue reading...
